titles.title: COMETS Act
A bill to allow the procurement of supplies and services for commercial activities at National Aeronautics and Space Administration centers.
COMETS Act
Contracts and Obligations Modernization for Efficient Terms of Service Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Contracts and Obligations Modernization for Efficient Terms of Service Act or the COMETS Act
This bill authorizes the National Aeronautics and Space Administration to procure supplies and services for commercial activities at its centers.
